heisig_chinese_memo: In the miscellaneous news section they report an assembly line of men in top hats standing in trees betting on the turkey fights down below.
Ru_trainchinese: zá: (прил/глаг) разнообразный, разнородный, смешанный; дополнительный; смешивать(ся), перемешивать(ся)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Look at nine different telephone poles and you'll see that they all have miscellaneous stickers all over them.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " clothing " and " collection ", the original meaning is the combination and coordination of various colors. "Shuowen": "Colors meet. From clothes, collected sounds." "Zhou Li‧ Kaogongji‧ Paintings": "The things of painting are mixed with five colors. The east is blue, the south is red, and the west is The white is black, the sky is mysterious, and the earth is yellow." Sun Yi asked Zheng Zheng to quote "Shu Wen": "Miscellaneous, the five elements are in harmony."

" Miscellaneous " can mean miscellaneous and impure. "Zhuangzi: Deliberately": "Pure and not complicated, static and unchanged, melancholy and inactive, moving in accordance with the sky, this way to nourish the spirit."

" Miscellaneous " also means mixed and mixed. "Yi Zhou Shu‧ Cheng Dian": "The scholar-officials are not involved in business."

" Miscellaneous " also means disorder. "Mo Zi‧ Fei Gongxia": "The sun and the moon change from time to time, and the heat and cold are mixed." Sun Yi let Xian Qu quoted Lu Deming in the "Yi" to explain: "Meng Xiyun: Miscellaneous, chaotic. It is said that the cold and heat come in disorder and lose their perseverance."

" Miscellaneous " also means many. "Xunzi: Evil of Nature": "All the people are sensitive and have no class, and they are useless because of their mixed ability."

" Miscellaneous " also refers to both. "Sun Tzu‧ Nine Changes": "The worries of the wise man must be mixed with the interests and disadvantages. When mixed with the advantages, it is also credible; when mixed with the disadvantages, the problems can be solved." Cao Cao's note: "If you participate in the benefits, you are also If you plan to do harm, you can solve it."

" Miscellaneous " also refers to common and together. "Mandarin-Under Yue Yu": "Adverse events are born, the heaven and the earth are not formed, and the first is to conquer. If the matter is not achieved, the miscellaneous will be tortured." Wei Zhao's note: "Miscellaneous, still all."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " clothing " and " ji ", the original meaning is the combination and coordination of various colors.
humanum_full_description:
從「衣」，「集」聲，本義為各種色彩相組合、配合。《說文》：「五彩相會。从衣，集聲。」《周禮‧考工記‧畫繢》：「畫繢之事，雜五色，東方謂之青，南方謂之赤，西方謂之白，北方謂之黑，天謂之玄，地謂之黃。」孫詒讓正義引《說文》：「雜，五采相合也。」

　　「雜」可表示駁雜、不純。《莊子‧刻意》：「純粹而不雜，靜一而不變，惔而無為，動以天行，此養神之道也。」

　　「雜」還表示混雜、參雜。《逸周書‧程典》：「士大夫不雜於工商。」

　　「雜」也表示紊亂。《墨子‧非攻下》：「日月不時，寒暑雜至。」孫詒讓閒詁引《易》陸德明釋文：「孟喜云：雜，亂也。謂寒暑錯亂而至，失其恒節。」

　　「雜」亦表示繁多。《荀子‧性惡》：「齊給便敏而無類，雜能旁魄而無用。」

　　「雜」也指兼及。《孫子‧九變》：「是故智者之慮，必雜於利害。雜於利，而務可信也；雜於害，而患可解也。」曹操注：「既參於利，則亦計於害，雖有患可解也。」

　　「雜」還指共同、一起。《國語‧越語下》：「逆節萌生，天地未形，而先為之征，其事是以不成，雜受其刑。」韋昭注：「雜，猶俱也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「衣」，「集」聲，本義為各種色彩相組合、配合。

Pinyin: zá
English Definition: mixed; miscellaneous; various; to mix
Antonyms: 純
Total strokes: 18; Radical: 隹
Pictophonetic: 隹 indicates the sound; 隹 (bird) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • ⿳ Above to middle and below
      • 亠 [ tóu ] lid, cover; head
      • 从 [ cóng ] from, by, since, whence, through
      • 木 [ mù ] tree; wood, lumber; wooden
    • 隹 [ zhuī ] short-tailed bird; sparrow

雜交 [ zá jiāo ]: to hybridize; to crossbreed; promiscuity
雜技 [ zá jì ]: acrobatics; Classifiers: 场

從「 衣 」，「 集 」聲，本義為各種色彩相組合、配合。《說文》：「五彩相會。从衣，集聲。」《周禮‧考工記‧畫繢》：「畫繢之事，雜五色，東方謂之青，南方謂之赤，西方謂之白，北方謂之黑，天謂之玄，地謂之黃。」孫詒讓正義引《說文》：「雜，五采相合也。」 「 雜 」可表示駁雜、不純。《莊子‧刻意》：「純粹而不雜，靜一而不變，惔而無為，動以天行，此養神之道也。」 「 雜 」還表示混雜、參雜。《逸周書‧程典》：「士大夫不雜於工商。」 「 雜 」也表示紊亂。《墨子‧非攻下》：「日月不時，寒暑雜至。」孫詒讓閒詁引《易》陸德明釋文：「孟喜云：雜，亂也。謂寒暑錯亂而至，失其恒節。」 「 雜 」亦表示繁多。《荀子‧性惡》：「齊給便敏而無類，雜能旁魄而無用。」 「 雜 」也指兼及。《孫子‧九變》：「是故智者之慮，必雜於利害。雜於利，而務可信也；雜於害，而患可解也。」曹操注：「既參於利，則亦計於害，雖有患可解也。」 「 雜 」還指共同、一起。《國語‧越語下》：「逆節萌生，天地未形，而先為之征，其事是以不成，雜受其刑。」韋昭注：「雜，猶俱也。」

雜字的基本解释

雜
zá
见“杂”。

雜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zá］
［《廣韻》徂合切，入合，從。］
亦作“襍1”。“杂1”的繁体字。“籴2”的被通假字。亦作“雑1”。
(1)组合；配合。
(2)混杂；参杂。
(3)驳杂；不精纯。
(4)紊乱；使紊乱。
(5)多；繁多。
(6)装饰。
(7)兼及。
(8)共同，一起。
(9)一种诗体。参见“雜詩”。
(10)古代杂剧、传奇中生、旦、净、丑以外的一种行当，一般扮演各种临时上场、无关重要的人物。
(11)通“集”。集合；聚集。
(12)通“匝”。圆周。

雜字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【隹字部】　雜； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1368第40
【廣韻】徂合切【集韻】【韻會】昨合切，?音䕹。【說文】五彩相合也。【玉篇】糅也。【易·坤卦】夫?黃者，天地之雜也。【周禮·冬官考工記】畫繢之事雜五色。　又【禮·玉藻·雜帶註】雜，猶飾也，卽上之韠也。　又【玉篇】同也。【廣韻】集也。【易·繫辭】雜物撰德。【疏】言雜聚天下之物。　又【揚子·方言】碎也。【易·繫辭】其稱名也，雜而不越。【疏】辭理雜碎，各有倫序，而不相乖越。　又【玉篇】厠也。　又最也。　又【廣韻】帀也。　又穿也。　又鳥名。【爾雅·釋鳥】爰居，雜縣。【疏】爰居，海鳥也，一名雜縣。　又【集韻】七盍切【韻會】【正韻】七合切，?音囃。【公羊傳·成十五年】諸大夫皆雜然曰：仲氏也，其然乎。【釋文】雜，七合反，又如字。

雜字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
雜字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
miscellaneous
zá
See "Miscellaneous".
miscellaneous
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zá］
["Guangyun" is cut, enter, and follow. ]
Also known as "Xing 1". "Miscellaneous 1" in traditional characters. The false word for "籴2" was passed. Also known as "雑1".
(1) Combination; cooperation.
(2) Mixed; mixed.
(3) Miscellaneous; not pure.
(4) Disorder; make disorder.
(5) Many; many.
(6) Decoration.
(7) Concurrently.
(8) Together, together.
(9) A poetic style. See "Miscellaneous Poems".
(10) A profession other than ancient Zaju, Legend Zhongsheng, Dan, Jing, and Chou, generally playing various temporary and irrelevant characters.
(11) Through "collection". Gather; gather.
(12) Through the "turn". circumference.
miscellaneous
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Collections】【Department of 隹字】　Miscellaneous; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: Page 1368 No. 40
[Guang Yun] Harmony [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Harmony yesterday,? Yin Pi. [Said the text] The colors are also in harmony. [Jade articles] Mix together. [Easy·Kun Gua] Husband? Huang Zhe, the world is also mixed. 【Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji】The paintings are mixed.　[Li·Yu Zao·Miscellaneous Belt Note】Miscellaneous, still decorated, and 韠 on the top.　[Jade articles] The same also. [Guang Yun] Ji Ye. 【Yi·XiCi】Miscellaneous articles write German. [Sparse] Words are mixed together with things of the world.　[Yangtze Dialect] Broken. 【Yi·Xi Ci】The name is also miscellaneous but not overstepped. 【Sparse】The rhetorical theory is miscellaneous, and each has a coherent order, and is not obedient to each other.　[Jade Chapter] The toilet is also.　Also the best.　[Guang Yun] 帀 also.　I wear it again.　Also known as the bird name. 【Erya·Shiniao】Living in a miscellaneous county. [Sparse] Yanju, seabirds, a miscellaneous county.　[Jiyun] Seven-slice cut [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Seven-slice cut,? Yin 囃. 【The Story of Gongyang·Fifteen Years of Adulthood】All the doctors all said mixedly: Zhong's also, it's so natural. 【Explanation】Miscellaneous, seven inverse, and like words.
